translations: n.纤维素；（植物的）细胞膜质

sentences.sentence: In the second part, celluloses grafting copolymer were synthesized.
sentences.translation: 第二部分，纤维素的接枝共聚物的合成。

sentences.sentence: The factors of affection in the technological process of polynionic celluloses were discussed.
sentences.translation: 对制备工艺中的影响因素进行了分析讨论。

sentences.sentence: The results showed that the effectiveness of the residue fraction which was rich in dietary celluloses and lipids was similar to the...
sentences.translation: 本实验还说明，主要含有油酸和亚油酸的脂溶物是燕麦残渣级分中降低血清胆固醇有效成分之一。
